Class XCustomer

Namespace
IneAppWeb.DTOs

IbeAppWeb.dll

Represents a consumer entity with personal and contact information, as well as optional company and address details.

public class XCustomer

Remarks

This class is typically used to store and manage information about an individual or a company consumer, including their contact details, company affiliation, and associated address.
